data.name: Banish
data.detailed_description:
BANISH is a Single and Co-op horror survival game for 1-4 players. As a Priest, you are sent by the local church to a failed exorcism attempt in the Luxford Mansion. The Church Mission is about Mrs. Margaret Luxford who disappeared from social life after the unexplained suicide from her Husband.
Find out what happened with the Exorcism attempt, finish the Process, and try to stay alive if possible...


Group up and Banish!

New High Fidelity ( AMD and Nvidia Performance for Ultra Graphics ) with low to middle Hardware requirements.

Ready to Banish?


1-4 Player online Co-op
- Group up and Enter the Mansion. But be careful the possessed Entity is around and Hunts you.
- Challenging gameplay
- Different states of Anger of the possessed Entity
- No two Rounds will be the same. Changing Behaviour from the Ghost and different Banish locations etc. are making every Round Different and need you to Plan your steps wisely.

Singleplayer
- Try to get the Excorsim done by yourself. Only for Hardcore Players, it won't be a walk in the Park...

Banish the Entity

- The goal is to find and start the Ritual by finding Banish items and fulfilling Tasks which ends in a frightening Run against the Entity.
- Difficulty increases as you progress with the exorcism. If she gets angry...
- Hide in closets, help your friends by reviving them, and more
- The Entity can travel through broken Mirrors, her position is not predictable and will challenge you and your Group.
- Replayability
Different Ritual Places, different Locations of the Items, Different places where the Entity can find broken Mirrors, locked Doors, and more will make every round different.
- Fight back
Show her with a Hand Mirror her real Face, she won't like that... This will give you time to fulfill the Ritual.
- Multiplayer Voicechat
Use the standard Steam Voicechat or try a new position-based proximity Voicechat, but be careful she can hear you...



Difficulty Levels unlockable
Play in Normal, Hard, and Nightmare Mode.
The Entity will change in appearance and Behavior.

Additional Notes:
AMD FIDELITY
Lobbies
Unreal Engine 5 ready
Steady Development, more Maps, and entities will come.

data.short_description: BANISH is a Single and Co-op horror survival game for 1-4 players. As a Priest, you are sent by the local church to a failed exorcism attempt in the Luxford Mansion. Fear, Panic, and Horror awaits you...

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 14 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
